Observed at: Pitt Meadows 6:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Flurries over higher terrain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
